column5: Anyone catch this article? Seems crazy to be allowing the MnR to relocate and remove nests but order them to rebuild the tree nesting areas with ground nesting areas.  If this was already posted my bad.  http://www.ofah.org/News/index.cfm?ID=153
It's easier to oil their nests if they're on the ground..
If it were I,would would sooner use a FLAME thrower.LOL
